Haven't really played this game till now because I'm still busy playing
Syndicate. However, I have installed the update on this game and everything
seems to be fine. The delivery of the game was fine and on the promised time.

no limited addition and the lock was also broken

Very good game the graphics, gameplay all are fine. I have completed the whole
game and it worked out for me without any issue. But to be honest the game has
a lots of bugs and glitches I think the developers at Ubisoft finished the
game in a hurry. Buy the game only if you are a fan of the assassin’s creed
franchise. I brought it as I am a fan of the series.  
About the product it arrived in a good condition and on time you also get a
redeem code for the optional add on content chemical revolution mission but
the code did not work for me but I suppose it will only work for the U.S. PSN
account not sure though. The game has an update file of around 6 GB it’s up to
you download it or not.  
About Amazon and the seller the delivery and packing was good and the product
was delivered earlier than the expected date of delivery. Thank you Amazon.
The limited edition game is cheaper than the the original game which is abf 5 stars

review:
The game is graphically impressive but if you played the old assassians creed
games then you won't notice much of a difference. Also the load time takes
about 40-60sec which is long time especially if you die often. The game has no
new innovation except for new parkour system and new customisation. Stealth
and story sucks. You will feel frustrated. Game will take about 10-12 hours.
5gb update is optional.

This is not an Indian product, so this will create problem unlocking online
content . The product was already used as I can notice .

game, please check the Region of Disk.

After the patches, it is actually a good game with a newer engine. Also
Ubisoft is giving Dead Kings DLC free (make US account), to apologise for
releasing an unfinished product. The sellers copy is region free but we in
India (using default UK region accounts) are still not able to download DLC’s
& redeem codes, a problem very particular to Ubisoft. (Make a US account on
the side, install there & you’ll be then able to play seamlessly from your
Indian (UK) account).
The redeem code is not working, this is total cheating on the seller's side..

review:
Pros  
👍Great story.  
👍Great graphics.  
👍Parkour is good.  
👍A spectacular recreation of 18th century France and French revolution.  
  
CONS  
  
👎Hell of a lot glitches.  
👎Combat is a little trash.  
👎World map riddled with side missions and other icons.  
👎Somewhat repetitive gameplay.

Chemical revolution code is already used game is good

Great service and great game. Really loved the graphics and gameplay the order
was delivered on time and i am very happy with the service of Amazon. Game has
little glitches but rest is all fine.

You need American PSN account for the codes to work. Need 6.5 gb update.
Enjoying the game so far

the gameplay is same as always but the the story was worth a 1000 rupees
